channel.title: Welcome! on Intro to R
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on Intro to R

item.title: Additional Resources
item.description: A non-programmer friendly introduction to the R language: Hands-On Programming with R An intermediate-level exploration of data analysis using R’s Tidyverse packages: R for Data Science R for Data Science: Exercise Solutions Swirl: learn R interactively

item.title: Who we are
item.description: The instructors for this course are Drs. Joy Nyaanga and Stella Karuri. Though largely self-taught users of R and other programming languages, we both use R extensively in our respective work. Contact us at… Joy Stella
